senses.sense_definition: A shrub native to the southwestern United States and Mexico (Senegalia berlandieri), often valued for the high-quality honey produced from its nectar.

examples.text: Beekeepers move their hives to the brush country when the <w>huajillo</w> is in bloom.
The ranch was covered in dense thickets of <w>huajillo</w> and prickly pear cactus.
